name: slouchy crochet beanie
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials), in one printable file without advertisements.

if you’re looking to create the perfect cozy accessory for the cooler months, this slouchy beanie crochet pattern is it!

just like the matching crochet mittens, this crochet beanie slouchy is a one-piece, no-sew pattern.

**matching mittens:** https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/easy-crochet-mittens-4

**matching scarf:** https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/easy-crochet-pocket-scarf

**sizing**
this pattern includes sizes baby, toddler, child, teen / adult small, adult medium / large.

**yarn**
the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand wool ease in fisherman, canyon sunset, and succulent lion brand yarns wool ease, worsted weight / 4 yarn, 80% acrylic / 20% wool (197 yards / 180 m / 85 g / 3 oz) other worsted weight (4) yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met.

slouchy crochet beanie pattern design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.
